secondary_street_name: Land at Wales Farm Road and Portal Way
description: Details of condition 32 pursuant to planning permission referene 165514OPDFUL dated 20/10/2023 for redevelopment of the site to provide a single storey basement with a part 10, part 36 storey building comprising 350 residential units and ancillary facilities (Use Class C3) with a mix of studio, 1 bed, 2 bed and 3 bed flats and 503qm (GIA) of flexible use class E and/or Sui Generis (pub/wine bar/drinking establishment) and/or F1 and/or F2 floorspace and a landscaped public realm, together with associated public and private amenity space, cycle parking, car parking, servicing, landscaping and other associated works (Full Planning Application accompanied by an Environmental Impact Assessment) (Amended description, revised plans and affordable housing received 17/07/20)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
